announcement.customStyle: display: block; padding: 15px; list-style-type: none; margin-right: 20px;
announcement.title: null
announcement.body:
Temporary Downtime for Student Information System
All of Banner Production and ancillary systems will be unavailable from 12:00 PM on Saturday, June 5, 2020 until approximately 9:00 AM on Tuesday, June 9, 2020 while the Student Information System and database are upgraded.

announcement.title: Temporary Downtime for the Student Information System: Thurs., Nov. 4
announcement.body: All of Banner Production and ancillary systems, including OSCAR and Degree Works, will be unavailable from Thursday, November 4th at 8:00 PM EDT until Friday, November 5th at 5:00 AM EDT while OIT applies patches to the operating systems, application clients, and database servers for Banner and DegreeWorks.

announcement.title: If you see a "Sesson Timeout" error when accessing OSCAR...
announcement.body: The "Session Timeout" error is evidence of an expired cookie stored in the browser. Using a private or incognito window might or might not solve the problem. Switch to a different browser and/or clear out stored cookies.

announcement.title: Updates on the campus response to coronavirus (Covid-19)
